string.text: Surgical Precision

You are a professional with a scalpel. When using any medical item, you are granted a portion of its radiation and HP healing as an additional boost over time.
 
 
Max Perk Level: 5

You are a professional with a scalpel.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]EFFECTS:
 %c[d_blue] - %c[ui_gray_2] Medical items grant %c[d_green]6% of its radiation and HP healing %c[ui_gray_2]as an additional boost over time

Calm Mind

Through meditation and continued exposure to the Zone, your mind has become stronger against its horrors. You are now more resistant to psy damage, and regenerate psy health faster. Regeneration is multiplied when near a campfire.
 
 
Max Perk Level: 5

Through meditation and continued exposure to the Zone, your mind has become stronger against its horrors.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]EFFECTS:
 %c[d_blue] - %c[ui_gray_2] Reduce psy damage by %c[d_green]3%
 %c[d_blue] - %c[ui_gray_2] Regenerate psy health %c[d_green]20% faster
 %c[d_blue] - %c[ui_gray_2] Regeneration is multiplied by %c[d_green]20% %c[ui_gray_2]when near a campfire

Repair Junkie

Keeping your gear in good condition has taught you to be more efficent with your tools. You now have a chance to not consume a repair item when repairing or cleaning any item.
 
 
Max Perk Level: 5

Keeping your gear in good condition has taught you to be more efficent with your tools.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]EFFECTS:
 %c[d_blue] - %c[ui_gray_2] Repairing or cleaning has a %c[d_green]5% %c[ui_gray_2]chance to not consume the used repair item

Lockpick Mastery

After finding a locksmithing guide, you are now more careful when picking the locks of locked containers. Locked containers are now easier to open.
 
 
Max Perk Level: 5
 
 
%c[d_red]REQUIRES ANOMALY LOOTBOXES MOD IN ORDER TO HAVE ANY EFFECT!!!

After finding a locksmithing guide, you are now more careful when picking the locks of locked containers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]EFFECTS:
 %c[d_blue] - %c[ui_gray_2] Locked containers have %c[d_green]15% %c[ui_gray_2]of their base difficulty reduced
 %c[d_red] - REQUIRES ANOMALY LOOTBOXES OR A MODIFACTION OF THE MOD IN ORDER TO HAVE ANY EFFECT

Silver-Tongued
When bartering, you receive better prices when buying or selling.

Your charisma and charm is unmatched within the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]EFFECTS:
 %c[d_blue] > %c[ui_gray_2] Receive %c[d_green]5% %c[ui_gray_2]better prices when buying or selling

Mag Loader
Loading ammo is a pain. So, you decided to just get better at it. You now load ammo into weapon magazines much faster.

Loading ammo is a pain. So, you decided to just get better at it. You now load ammo into weapon magazines 20% faster.
 
 
Max Perk Level: 5
